query: hotels for families with kids in Las Vegas
title: Amazing hotels for families with kids in Las Vegas
excerpt: Finding the perfect hotel for a family trip to Las Vegas can be quite a challenge, especially with so many options that may not cater to children's needs. This curated list highlights hotels that offer family-friendly amenities and activities, ensuring that both kids and parents can enjoy a memorable vacation together. By focusing on these dedicated spaces, families can make the most of their time in this vibrant city without the stress of unsuitable accommodations.
intro: Discover the top family-friendly hotels in Las Vegas that promise fun and comfort for both kids and parents alike.

hotels.name: Tahiti Village Resort & Spa
hotels.description: Escape to Tahiti Village Resort & Spa, a serene oasis in the vibrant heart of Las Vegas. Enjoy the full-service spa, unwind in the outdoor pool and lazy river, and savor delectable cuisine at the on-site restaurant. With spacious guest rooms featuring Smart TVs and convenient amenities, this resort ensures a perfect blend of relaxation and entertainment for your ideal getaway.
hotels.highlight: Tahiti Village Resort & Spa offers a lazy river, arcade, and full-service spa for family-friendly fun and relaxation.

hotels.name: Home2 Suites By Hilton Las Vegas Strip South
hotels.description: Home2 Suites By Hilton Las Vegas Strip South features spacious suites equipped with HDTVs, kitchen facilities, and cozy bedding, ensuring a comfortable stay. Guests can enjoy a complimentary hot buffet breakfast and unwind at the outdoor saline pool, while the laundry and fitness center provide added convenience. Ideally situated near the Mandalay Bay Convention Center and just 4 km from McCarran International Airport, this hotel is perfect for both leisure and business travelers.
hotels.highlight: Home2 Suites By Hilton Las Vegas Strip South offers spacious family suites with kitchen facilities, an outdoor saline pool, and complimentary breakfast.

hotels.name: Hampton Inn & Suites Las Vegas-Henderson
hotels.description: Experience luxury at the Hampton Inn & Suites Las Vegas-Henderson, where spacious rooms and suites come equipped with modern amenities, including free WiFi and a hot breakfast buffet. Enjoy the outdoor pool, hot tub, and barbecue area, all while being conveniently located near a variety of restaurants and attractions like Galleria Mall and Lake Mead Recreation Area. Book your stay for a memorable getaway filled with comfort and adventure.
hotels.highlight: Offers family rooms, an outdoor pool, and board games for an engaging stay in Las Vegas-Henderson.

hotels.name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Las Vegas
hotels.description: Embassy Suites Las Vegas boasts a prime location just minutes from the lively Las Vegas Strip and directly across from the University of Nevada. Guests can unwind in spacious suites featuring two flat-screen TVs, a microwave, and a refrigerator, along with access to an outdoor pool and fitness center. Enjoy a delicious cooked-to-order breakfast and relax with complimentary evening snacks at the Three Palms Caf√©, making your stay both convenient and enjoyable.
hotels.highlight: Embassy Suites by Hilton Las Vegas provides spacious family suites, a kids' menu, and an outdoor pool for family enjoyment.

hotels.name: Courtyard By Marriott Las Vegas Stadium Area
hotels.description: Experience the ultimate relaxation at Courtyard By Marriott Las Vegas Stadium Area with its stunning outdoor pool and soothing hot tub, ideal for unwinding after a day on the lively Las Vegas Strip. The hotel features modern, spacious guestrooms equipped with amenities like free Wi-Fi, cable TV, and mini-refrigerators for your convenience. Stay active in the well-equipped gym and enjoy hassle-free parking during your stay for an effortless getaway.
hotels.highlight: Offers family rooms, an outdoor pool, and kids meals to accommodate families visiting Las Vegas.

hotels.name: Jockey Resort Suites Center Strip
hotels.description: Experience the luxury of all-suite accommodations at Jockey Resorts, located on the vibrant Las Vegas Strip. Each suite features fully equipped kitchens and modern amenities, including free high-speed internet, ensuring a comfortable stay. Enjoy refreshing swims in the outdoor pool, a well-equipped fitness center, and easy access to a variety of dining and entertainment options just moments away.
hotels.highlight: Offers family suites with fully equipped kitchens, an outdoor pool, and easy access to dining and entertainment.
